message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me there?
